Assessment of basic spatial-r-gis skills

For this time no upload or defined exercise has to be done.

Task:
Please read and apply the following chapters of the Geocomputation with R book.
- Introduction
- Geographic Data in R
- Geographic Data IO
Note: It would be very beneficial if you could get a solid overview of all the foundations chapters. What does that mean? At least you should have in mind for arising questions that there are solution examples.
Note:
You might find it helpful to document your learning progress and experiences in a portfolio.Support is provided by the module Reproducible Research It provides some entry points for documenting and structuring inquiry-based learning and work.
For this task you might follow the instructions you will find at Academic wiriting made easy.
For this time no upload of the exercises has to be done.
